objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: A Patrulha da Noite se prepara para a batalha. Gilly e Little Sam escapam de Mole's Town e chegam a Castle Black, onde Sam os esconde. Os Selvagens atacam de ambos os lados da muralha. O exército de Tormund irrompe do sul e enfrenta a Patrulha da Noite. Um gigante invade o túnel em Castelo Negro, mas é morto por Grenn e outros cinco, ao custo de suas próprias vidas. Alliser Thorne se junta à luta na parte sul, deixando o incompetente Janos Slynt comandando a Muralha. Slynt deixa Jon no comando e, quando a maré vira na Muralha, Jon se junta à luta abaixo. Depois de ver Jon matar Styr, Ygritte aponta seu arco para ele, mas hesita, e é fatalmente baleada por Olly. Ajudado por Fantasma, o lobo gigante de Jon, a Patrulha da Noite protege a fortaleza interna de Castelo Negro e um Tormund ferido é preso. Os escaladores de parede são obliterados por uma enorme foice balançando. Os Selvagens se retiram para a noite. Jon vai além da Muralha para encontrar e matar Mance Rayder, acreditando que o exército selvagem se fragmentará sem seu comando.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: A batalha entre a Patrulha da Noite e os selvagens chegou.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S04E9 - The Watchers on the Wall

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: The Night's Watch prepares for the battle. Gilly and Little Sam escape Mole's Town and arrive at Castle Black, where Sam hides them. The Wildlings attack from both sides of the wall. Tormund's army breaks through from the south and engages the Night's Watch. A giant breaches the tunnel into Castle Black but is killed by Grenn and five others, at the cost of their own lives. Alliser Thorne joins the fight in the southern part, leaving the incompetent Janos Slynt commanding the Wall. Slynt leaves Jon in charge, and as the tide turns at the Wall, Jon joins the fight below. After seeing Jon kill Styr, Ygritte aims her bow at him but hesitates, then is fatally shot by Olly. Assisted by Ghost, Jon's direwolf, the Night's Watch secure Castle Black's inner keep, and a wounded Tormund is arrested. The wall climbers are obliterated by a massive swinging scythe. The Wildlings retreat for the night. Jon goes beyond the Wall to find and kill Mance Rayder, believing that the Wildling army will fragment without his command.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: The battle between the Night's Watch and the wildlings has come.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S04E9 - The Watchers on the Wall

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: Joffrey deixa Sansa de lado para se casar com Margaery Tyrell e aliar-se à família Tyrell. Tyrion teme pela segurança dele e de Shae depois que Tywin é nomeado Mão do Rei. Melisandre dá a Stannis uma nova esperança. Brienne mata soldados Stark depois que eles reconhecem Jaime. Catelyn não consegue dissuadir Robb de se casar com Talisa, quebrando sua promessa de se casar com a filha de Walder Frey. Em Qarth, dentro da Casa dos Imortais, Daenerys entra em um simulacro de uma sala destruída do Trono de Ferro e se reúne com o que parece ser Khal Drogo e seu filho recém-nascido. Sabendo que é irreal, ela sai e recupera com sucesso seus dragões, que queimam fatalmente Pree, que tenta aprisioná-la. Ela sela Daxos e seu servo traidor dentro de seu cofre vazio e reivindica seus outros bens, com os quais Jorah pagará por um pequeno navio. Em Winterfell, Theon quer que seus homens lutem contra o exército de Robb, mas eles o deixam inconsciente e vão embora; Winterfell é incendiado. Fatalmente ferido Meistre Luwin convence Osha a fugir com Brandon e Rickon para a Muralha para a proteção de Jon. Depois que Arya, Torta Quente e Gendry escapam de Harrenhal, H'ghar dá a Arya uma moeda não monetária que ele diz que pode ser usada para encontrá-lo em Bravos. Antes dela, ele magicamente muda seu rosto. Ao norte da Muralha, Halfhand força Jon a matá-lo para provar sua lealdade aos Wildlings. Um exército de Caminhantes Brancos e homens mortos cerca o Punho dos Primeiros Homens; Sam se esconde, observando horrorizado enquanto eles passam.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Joffrey coloca Sansa de lado por Margaery Tyrell. Robb se casa com Talisa Maegyr. Jon se prepara para conhecer Mance Rayder. Arya se despede de Jaqen H'ghar. Daenerys tenta resgatar seus dragões.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: Joffrey sets Sansa aside to marry Margaery Tyrell and ally with the Tyrell family. Tyrion fears for his and Shae's safety after Tywin is named Hand of the King. Melisandre gives Stannis a new hope. Brienne kills Stark soldiers after they recognize Jaime. Catelyn fails to dissuade Robb from marrying Talisa, breaking his promise to wed Walder Frey's daughter. In Qarth, inside the House of the Undying, Daenerys enters a simulacrum of a destroyed Iron Throne room, then is reunited with what appears to be Khal Drogo and their infant son. Knowing it is unreal, she leaves and successfully retrieves her dragons, who fatally burn Pree, who tries to imprison her. She seals Daxos and her traitorous servant inside his empty vault and claims his other possessions, with which Jorah will pay for a small ship. In Winterfell, Theon wants his men to fight Robb's army, but they knock him unconscious and leave; Winterfell is torched. Fatally wounded Maester Luwin convinces Osha to escape with Brandon and Rickon to the Wall for Jon's protection. After Arya, Hot Pie, and Gendry escape Harrenhal, H'ghar gives Arya a non-monetary coin he says can be used to find him in Braavos. Before her, he magically changes his face. North of the Wall, Halfhand forces Jon to kill him to prove his loyalty to the Wildlings. An army of White Walkers and dead men surrounds the Fist of the First Men; Sam hides, watching in horror as they pass.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Joffrey puts Sansa aside for Margaery Tyrell. Robb marries Talisa Maegyr. Jon prepares to meet Mance Rayder. Arya says farewell to Jaqen H'ghar. Daenerys tries to rescue her dragons.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: Catelyn chega ao acampamento de Renly para negociar uma aliança. A guerreira, Brienne de Tarth, ganha o direito de se juntar à guarda do rei de Renly através do combate. Renly se casou recentemente com Margaery Tyrell, irmã de Loras. Renly evita consumar o casamento dele e de Margaery devido à sua homossexualidade e relacionamento sexual com Loras. Nas Ilhas de Ferro, Balon planeja um ataque ao Norte, liderado por Yara. Depois de queimar sua carta para Robb alertando sobre o ataque iminente de Balon, Theon afirma sua fidelidade à Casa Greyjoy em uma cerimônia à base de água. Em Porto Real, Tyrion aprisiona Pycelle depois de determinar que ele é o informante de Cersei. Tyrion nomeia sua amante, Shae, como serva de Sansa, tanto para proteger Shae quanto para vigiar Sansa. Além da Muralha, Craster exige que os Vigilantes da Noite saiam. Jon descobre que Jeor Mormont sempre soube e ignorou os crimes incestuosos de Craster em troca do descanso de seus homens em sua fortaleza. No caminho para a muralha, os recrutas da Patrulha da Noite são atacados por soldados Lannister em busca de Gendry. Yoren é morto, e Arya e Gendry são feitos prisioneiros. Para proteger Gendry, Arya afirma falsamente que um menino que os guardas mataram era Gendry.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Tyrion tenta ver em quem pode confiar no Pequeno Conselho. Catelyn visita Renly para tentar convencê-lo a se juntar a Robb na guerra. Theon deve decidir se sua lealdade está com sua própria família ou com Robb.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S02E3 - What is Dead May Never Die
objects.__Episode__title_short: O Que Está Morto Não Pode Morrer

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: Catelyn arrives at Renly's camp to negotiate an alliance. The female warrior, Brienne of Tarth, wins the right to join Renly's king's guard through combat. Renly has recently wed Margaery Tyrell, Loras's sister. Renly avoids consummating his and Margaery's marriage due to his homosexuality and sexual relationship with Loras. In the Iron Islands, Balon plans an attack on the North, led by Yara. After burning his letter to Robb warning of Balon's impending attack, Theon affirms his allegiance to House Greyjoy in a water-based ceremony. In King's Landing, Tyrion imprisons Pycelle after determining he is Cersei's informant. Tyrion appoints his lover, Shae, as Sansa's handmaiden, both to protect Shae and watch Sansa. Beyond the Wall, Craster demands the Night's Watchmen leave. Jon discovers that Jeor Mormont has always known about and ignored Craster's incestuous crimes in exchange for his men's respite at his keep. On the road to the wall, the Night's Watch recruits are attacked by Lannister soldiers searching for Gendry. Yoren is killed, and Arya and Gendry are taken prisoner. To protect Gendry, Arya falsely states that a boy the guards have killed was Gendry.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Tyrion tries to see who he can trust in the Small Council. Catelyn visits Renly to try and persuade him to join Robb in the war. Theon must decide if his loyalties lie with his own family or with Robb.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S02E3 - What is Dead May Never Die
objects.__Episode__title_short: What is Dead May Never Die

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types
Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: Brienne and Podrick arrive at an inn near Winterfell and smuggle a message to Sansa, offering her help if it is needed. Sansa discovers Theon is at Winterfell, and Ramsay forces him to apologize to her for supposedly killing her younger brothers. At the Wall, Tormund Giantsbane agrees to an alliance with the Night's Watch in return for the Wildlings to settle south of the Wall. Jon and Tormund travel to Hardhome to persuade the Wildlings. Stannis's army leaves for Winterfell, taking his family and Melisandre with them. In Meereen, as Grey Worm recuperates, he and Misandei develop romantic feelings. Daenerys feeds one Meereen nobleman to her dragons, Viserion and Rhaegal, and imprisons the others. She later agrees to reopen the fighting pits and weds Loraq to facilitate peace. At sea, Tyrion and Jorah sail through Valyria, seeing Drogon flying overhead. They are attacked by stone men and escape, but Jorah is infected with greyscale.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Daenerys arrests the heads of Meereen's great families. Jon makes a difficult decision. Theon is forced to face Sansa. Stannis rides south. Tyrion and Jorah enter the ruins of Old Valyria.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: Em Porto Real, Tyrion se torna a Mão do Rei, para desgosto de Cersei. Em Pedra do Dragão, Stannis proclama fidelidade ao Deus da Luz da sacerdotisa Melisandre e reivindica o Trono de Ferro, tendo revelado a bastardia de Joffrey. Joffrey ordena que os filhos bastardos do Rei Robert sejam mortos. Um deles, Gendry, junto com Arya disfarçada, escaparam da cidade e estão sendo levados para Castelo Negro. Tendo conquistado três vitórias, Robb Stark, que agora é proclamado Rei do Norte, oferece paz aos Lannister em troca da independência do Norte e do retorno seguro de Sansa e Arya. Ele envia Theon para ganhar o apoio de Balon Greyjoy, e Catelyn para buscar uma aliança com Renly Baratheon, que também reivindica a coroa. Além da Muralha, a Patrulha da Noite se abriga com Craster e suas filhas/esposas. Em Essos, enquanto seu povo morre lentamente no Deserto Vermelho, Daenerys despacha três cavaleiros para realizar o reconhecimento.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Tyrion chega a Porto Real para ocupar o lugar de seu pai como Mão do Rei. Stannis Baratheon planeja tomar o Trono de Ferro para si. Robb tenta decidir seu próximo passo na guerra. A Patrulha da Noite chega à casa de Craster.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: In King's Landing, Tyrion becomes acting Hand of the King, much to Cersei's dismay. At Dragonstone, Stannis proclaims allegiance to the priestess Melisandre's God of Light and claims the Iron Throne, having revealed Joffrey's bastardy. Joffrey orders King Robert's bastard sons slaughtered. One, Gendry, along with the disguised Arya, have escaped the city and are being taken to Castle Black. Having won three victories, Robb Stark, who is now proclaimed as the King of the North, offers the Lannisters peace in exchange for the North's independence and Sansa's and Arya's safe return. He sends Theon to gain Balon Greyjoy's support, and Catelyn to seek an alliance with Renly Baratheon, who also claims the crown. Beyond the Wall, the Night's Watch shelters with Craster and his daughters/wives. In Essos, as her people slowly die in the Red Waste, Daenerys dispatches three riders to conduct reconnaissance.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Tyrion arrives at King's Landing to take his father's place as Hand of the King. Stannis Baratheon plans to take the Iron Throne for his own. Robb tries to decide his next move in the war. The Night's Watch arrive at the house of Craster.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: Robb descobre que Catelyn libertou secretamente Jaime Lannister, que Brienne está escoltando para resgatá-lo em troca de Sansa e Arya; Robb coloca sua mãe em prisão domiciliar e envia homens para capturar Jaime. Robb é atraído por uma médica espirituosa, Talisa Maegyr, uma mulher de Volantis. Yara chega a Winterfell e critica a tomada de Theon por Theon, dizendo que não tem valor estratégico para os Ironborn. Ele se recusa a voltar para Pyke com ela. Quando Tywin deixa Harrenhal para atacar Robb, Arya coage H'ghar a ajudá-la, Gendry e seu amigo Torta Quente a escapar. Em Porto Real, Cersei tenta chantagear Tyrion sequestrando Ros, que a primeira acredita ser sua amante secreta. Joffrey castiga Varys por não ter mais conhecimento das posições dos Stark e se prepara para liderar o ataque contra o próprio Stannis. A caminho de Porto Real, Stannis promete fazer de Davos sua Mão do Rei. Além da Muralha, o líder selvagem, "Rattleshirt", leva os capturados Jon e Halfhand ao seu rei, Mance Rayder. No Punho dos Primeiros Homens, os irmãos da Patrulha da Noite encontram um esconderijo de armas de vidro de dragão, deixados lá por um irmão anterior da Patrulha da Noite. Em Qarth, Jorah concorda em acompanhar Daenerys à Casa dos Imortais para recuperar seus dragões. Brandon e Rickon são revelados vivos e escondidos em Winterfell.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Stannis está a poucos dias de Porto Real. Tyrion se prepara para sua chegada. Jon e Qhorin são feitos prisioneiros pelos selvagens. Catelyn é presa por libertar Jaime. Arya, Gendry e Torta Quente planejam escapar de Harrenhal.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S02E8 - The Prince of Winterfell

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: Robb learns that Catelyn secretly freed Jaime Lannister, who Brienne is escorting to ransom him in exchange for Sansa and Arya; Robb places his mother under house arrest and sends men to capture Jaime. Robb is attracted to a spirited medic, Talisa Maegyr, a woman from Volantis. Yara arrives at Winterfell and criticizes Theon's seizing it, saying it has no strategic value to the Ironborn. He refuses to return to Pyke with her. When Tywin leaves Harrenhal to attack Robb, Arya coerces H'ghar into helping her, Gendry, and their friend, Hot Pie to escape. In King's Landing, Cersei attempts to blackmail Tyrion by abducting Ros, whom the former believes is his secret lover. Joffrey chastises Varys for not having more knowledge of Stark positions, and prepares to lead the attack against Stannis himself. En route to King's Landing, Stannis promises to make Davos his Hand of the King. Beyond the Wall, the Wildling leader, "Rattleshirt", leads the captured Jon and Halfhand to his king, Mance Rayder. At the Fist of the First Men, the brothers of the Night's Watch find a hidden cache of dragonglass weapons, left there by a previous Night's Watch brother. In Qarth, Jorah agrees to accompany Daenerys to the House of the Undying to retrieve her dragons. Brandon and Rickon are revealed to be alive and hiding in Winterfell.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Stannis is just days from King's Landing. Tyrion prepares for his arrival. Jon and Qhorin are taken prisoner by the wildlings. Catelyn is arrested for releasing Jaime. Arya, Gendry, and Hot Pie plan to escape from Harrenhal.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S02E8 - The Prince of Winterfell

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: Rei Robert renomeia Ned como Mão e o encarrega de administrar os assuntos até que Robert retorne da caça. Aldeões de Correrrio chegam com notícias de atrocidades cometidas por invasores, que Ned deduz que foram liderados por Sor Gregor Clegane, um retentor dos Lannister. Ned condena Sor Gregor à morte e convoca Tywin Lannister para um julgamento. Ned decide enviar Sansa (agora reconciliada com Joffrey) e Arya de volta a Winterfell. Ned descobriu que Joffrey e seus dois irmãos não são filhos biológicos de Robert, e foram pais de Jaime Lannister. Bran, enquanto testa sua nova sela, é atacado por Wildings desonestos. Robb, o filho mais velho de Ned, e Theon, o prisioneiro cativo de Ned, cujo pai, o rei Balon, era um rebelde caído, o resgatam, e a mulher Wilding, Osha, é escravizada. No Vale, Tyrion exige um julgamento por combate. Lysa escolhe Sor Vardis como seu campeão. O mercenário Bronn se oferece como campeão de Tyrion. Ele derrota Vardis e obtém a libertação de Tyrion. Enquanto isso, Viserys fica impaciente e irritado esperando que Drogo cumpra sua promessa, e ele ameaça matar o filho ainda não nascido de Daenerys. Drogo mata Viserys derramando ouro derretido em sua cabeça.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Enquanto se recupera de sua batalha com Jaime, Eddard é forçado a governar o reino enquanto Robert vai caçar. Tyrion exige um julgamento por combate por sua liberdade. Viserys está perdendo a paciência com Drogo.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: King Robert reappoints Ned as Hand and tasks him with running affairs until Robert returns from hunting. Villagers from Riverrun arrive with news of atrocities committed by raiders, who Ned deduces were led by Ser Gregor Clegane, a Lannister retainer. Ned sentences Ser Gregor to death and summons Tywin Lannister to a trial. Ned decides to send Sansa (now reconciled with Joffrey) and Arya back to Winterfell. Ned has discovered that Joffrey and his two siblings are not Robert's biological children, and were fathered by Jaime Lannister. Bran, while testing his new saddle, is attacked by rogue Wildings. Robb, Ned's oldest son, and Theon, Ned's captive ward, whose father, King Balon, was a fallen rebel, rescue him, and the woman Wilding, Osha, is enslaved. In the Vale, Tyrion demands a trial by combat. Lysa chooses Ser Vardis as her champion. The sellsword Bronn volunteers as Tyrion's champion. He defeats Vardis and obtains Tyrion's release. Meanwhile, Viserys grows impatient and angry waiting for Drogo to fulfill his promise, and he threatens to kill Daenerys' unborn child. Drogo kills Viserys by pouring molten gold on his head.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: While recovering from his battle with Jaime, Eddard is forced to run the kingdom while Robert goes hunting. Tyrion demands a trial by combat for his freedom. Viserys is losing his patience with Drogo.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: Retornando à Ilha Pyke depois de nove anos como pupilo dos Stark, Theon se reencontra com sua irmã, Yara, e seu pai, Balon, que despreza os modos nortenhos adquiridos por Theon. Balon planeja reconquistar sua coroa pela força. Cersei rejeita os termos de Robb, e Tyrion exila Slynt, chefe dos Mantos Dourados, para a Patrulha do Cavaleiro, e promove Bronn a Comandante da Patrulha. A caminho de Castelo Negro, Arya, se passando por um menino, admite sua verdadeira identidade para Gendry. Em Craster's Keep, ao norte da Muralha, Samwell Tarly é abordado por Gilly, uma das filhas de Craster. Gilly teme por seu filho ainda não nascido se for um menino; Jon Snow resiste a ajudar, apesar dos apelos de Sam. No Deserto Vermelho, um cavalo retorna ao acampamento de Daenerys com a cabeça decepada de seu cavaleiro em uma bolsa, uma mensagem de seus inimigos. Em Pedra do Dragão, o ex-contrabandista Sor Davos Seaworth, que agora serve Stannis, recruta o pirata Salladhor Saan e sua frota para o lado de Stannis. Stannis tenta gerar um herdeiro masculino com Melisandre, pois sua esposa, Selyse, não conseguiu produzir um filho. Jon descobre que Craster sacrifica seus filhos aos Caminhantes Brancos; Craster o pega espionando e deixa Jon inconsciente.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Arya faz amizade com Gendry. Tyrion tenta assumir o controle do Pequeno Conselho. Theon chega em sua casa, Pyke, para persuadir seu pai a ajudar Robb na guerra. Jon tenta investigar o segredo de Craster.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: Returning to Pyke Island after nine years as the Starks' ward, Theon is reunited with his sister, Yara, and his father, Balon, who despises Theon's acquired Northern ways. Balon plots to win back his crown by force. Cersei rejects Robb's terms, and Tyrion exiles Slynt, head of the Gold Cloaks, to the Knight's Watch, and promotes Bronn to Commander of the Watch. En route to Castle Black, Arya, impersonating a boy, admits her true identity to Gendry. At Craster's Keep, north of the Wall, Samwell Tarly is approached by Gilly, one of Craster's daughters. Gilly fears for her unborn child if it is a boy; Jon Snow resists helping, despite Sam's pleas. In the Red Waste, a horse returns to Daenerys' camp with its rider's severed head in a pouch, a message from her enemies. In Dragonstone, former smuggler Ser Davos Seaworth, who now serves Stannis, recruits the pirate Salladhor Saan and his fleet to Stannis' side. Stannis attempts to sire a male heir with Melisandre, as his wife, Selyse has failed to produce a son. Jon discovers that Craster sacrifices his sons to the White Walkers; Craster catches him spying and knocks Jon unconscious.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Arya makes friends with Gendry. Tyrion tries to take control of the Small Council. Theon arrives at his home, Pyke, in order to persuade his father into helping Robb with the war. Jon tries to investigate Craster's secret.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__title: GOT S05E2 - The House of Black and White
objects.__Episode__title_short: A Casa do Preto e Branco

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: Arya arrives in Braavos and is accepted into the "House of Black and White" by Jaqen H'ghar, who calls himself and his colleagues, "no one". Jaime recruits Bronn to travel to Dorne with him to retrieve Jaime's niece/daughter Myrcella, who is now betrothed to Trystane Martell, Prince Doran's son. Podrick recognises Littlefinger and Sansa in a tavern; Brienne offers Sansa her protection but is rebuffed. Littlefinger insists Brienne come with them, but she refuses and escapes with Podrick, then secretly follows Sansa. Stannis offers Jon legitimacy and lordship of Winterfell if he leaves the Night's Watch and supports him, but Jon keeps his vow to the Night's Watch; Samwell nominates Jon as Lord Commander against Alliser Thorne; Maester Aemon casts his ballot for Jon, breaking a tie vote. Daenerys incites a riot by executing a former slave who murdered a Sons of the Harpy prisoner prior to his trial. Drogon reappears, but soon leaves.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Arya arrives in Braavos. Jaime takes on a secret mission. Ellaria Sand seeks revenge for Oberyn's death. Stannis makes Jon a generous offer as the Night's Watch elects a new Lord Commander. Daenerys is faced with a difficult decision.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S05E2 - The House of Black and White
objects.__Episode__title_short: The House of Black and White

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Os parceiros escalam sua empresa para novos níveis.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: The partners escalate their enterprise to new levels.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: Em Harrenhal, Jaqen H'ghar, um dos três prisioneiros enjaulados que Arya salvou anteriormente, promete matar quaisquer três pessoas que ela escolher para pagar sua dívida com ela. Sua primeira escolha é o Cócegas, o homem que tortura mortalmente os cativos. Renly é morto pelo assassino sombrio de Melisandre. Lady Brienne é acusada do assassinato e Catelyn a força a fugir do acampamento. Excluindo os Tyrells, as forças de Renly se juntam a Stannis. Brienne jura fidelidade por toda a vida a Catelyn e protegerá suas filhas. Theon parte de Pyke e, contra as ordens de Yara, pretende provar que é um verdadeiro Ironborn capturando Winterfell durante a ausência de Robb. Lancel conta a Tyrion sobre o incêndio florestal, uma substância explosiva produzida em massa escondida nas masmorras da cidade e destinada a destruir a frota e o exército de Stannis durante o cerco iminente. Tyrion então assume o controle do esquema. No norte, a Patrulha da Noite chega a uma antiga fortaleza chamada Punho dos Primeiros Homens. Jeor Mormont permite que Jon se junte à equipe liderada por um veterano chamado Halfhand, para matar o líder inimigo. Em Qarth, Daxos propõe casamento a Daenerys em troca de fornecer a ela sua riqueza para conquistar os Sete Reinos. Sor Jorah a convence a ganhar o apoio do povo Westerosi.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Tyrion investiga uma arma secreta que o Rei Joffrey planeja usar contra Stannis. Enquanto isso, como um símbolo para salvar sua vida, Jaqen H'ghar se oferece para matar três pessoas que Arya escolhe.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S02E5 - The Ghost of Hareenhal

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: At Harrenhal, Jaqen H'ghar, one of three caged prisoners Arya previously saved, pledges to kill any three people she chooses to repay his debt to her. Her first choice is the Tickler, the man who mortally tortures the captives. Renly is killed by Melisandre's shadowy assassin. Lady Brienne is accused of the murder and Catelyn forces her to flee the camp. Excluding the Tyrells, Renly's forces join Stannis. Brienne swears life-long fealty to Catelyn and will protect her daughters. Theon sails from Pyke, and against Yara's orders, intends to prove he is a true Ironborn by capturing Winterfell during Robb's absence. Lancel tells Tyrion about wildfire, a mass-produced explosive substance hidden in the city's dungeons and intended to destroy Stannis' fleet and army during the impending siege. Tyrion then takes control of the scheme. In the north, the Night's Watch arrives at an ancient fortress called the Fist of the First Men. Jeor Mormont allows Jon to join the team led by a veteran named Halfhand, to kill the enemy leader. In Qarth, Daxos proposes marriage to Daenerys in exchange for providing her his wealth to conquer the Seven Kingdoms. Ser Jorah convinces her to instead gain the Westerosi peoples' support.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Tyrion investigates a secret weapon that King Joffrey plans to use against Stannis. Meanwhile, as a token for saving his life, Jaqen H'ghar offers to kill three people that Arya chooses.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S02E5 - The Ghost of Hareenhal

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Kim e Saul alistam alguns rostos conhecidos em seu esquema para pegar Howard. Realidades duras surgem em Nacho. Gus investiga suas suspeitas.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Kim and Saul enlist some familiar faces in their scheme to get Howard. Harsh realities dawn on Nacho. Gus investigates his suspicions.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types
Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: Jon leaves for Hardhome with Tormund and some rangers. Maester Aemon dies shortly after. Gilly is attacked by two Watchmen. Samwell intervenes and is overpowered until Ghost threatens them. Samwell and Gilly consummate their relationship. Sansa begs Theon to help her escape Winterfell, but instead he informs Ramsay, who then flays Brienne's informant inside Winterfell. At his army camp, Stannis refuses Melisandre request to sacrifice Shireen to gain the God of Lights favor. Jorah and Tyrion are sold to slaver, Qaggaz, and are taken to Daznak's fighting pit. Daenerys and her consort, Loraq, inspect the pit in preparation for the upcoming games. Jorah defeats the other fighters, reveals his identity and Tyrion appears as his "gift" to her. In Dorne, while in the dungeon, Tyene Sand gives Bronn the antidote to a poison called "The Long Farewell" that she has infected him with. Prince Doran allows Jaime take Myrcella and her fiance, Prince Trystane, to King's Landing. The High Sparrow denies Olenna's demand that Loras and Margaery be released. The High Sparrow then arrests Cersei for her previous affair with her cousin Lancel.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Jon heads east as trouble begins to stir for Sam and Gilly at Castle Black. Sansa asks Theon for help. Tyrion and Jorah are sold as slaves. Cersei savors her triumph over the Tyrells as new plots are developed in the shadows.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__title_short: Não Rebaixados, Não Curvados, Não Quebrados

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: H'ghar takes Arya to a chamber filled with the faces of dead people. Jaime and Bronn reach the Water Gardens and find Myrcella with Trystane. The Sand Snakes attack them but Dornish guards arrive and arrest everyone. Jorah and Tyrion are captured by pirates. They narrowly escape slavery when Tyrion manages to talk their way to the fighting pits of Meereen. Littlefinger informs Cersei that Roose Bolton intends to marry Sansa to Ramsay. He offers to lead the knights of the Vale to Winterfell to defeat whichever weakened side wins the conflict between Roose and Stannis. If successful, Littlefinger will be named Warden of the North. Olenna Tyrell arrives in King's Landing and warns Cersei that imprisoning Loras has jeopardized their alliance. At Loras' inquest, Loras and Margaery both deny his homosexuality. The male prostitute, Olyvar, contradicts their testimony and Margaery is arrested for lying to the gods. Tommen is uncertain and ineffective. At Winterfell, Sansa weds Ramsay. On their wedding night, Ramsay rapes her in front of Theon.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Arya is put to the test. Tyrion and Jorah are captured by slavers. Loras Tyrell is judged by the Sparrows. Jaime and Bronn face the Sand Snakes. Sansa marries Ramsay Bolton.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: Contra a vontade de Cersei, Tyrion envia ela e a filha de Jaime, Myrcella, para Dorne para proteção. Theon captura Winterfell e executa Sor Rodrik Cassel. Osha, o Wildling cativo, junto com Hodor, ajuda Bran e Rickon a escapar. Robb se reúne com a curandeira, Talisa Maegyr. No Punho dos Primeiros Homens, Jon captura uma selvagem chamada Ygritte, mas é separado de sua patrulha enquanto a persegue depois que ela escapa. Joffrey incita um motim em Porto Real, no qual ele quase é morto e Sansa quase estuprada. Tywin permite que Mindinho busque a fidelidade dos Tyrell. Em Harrenhal, Arya manda H'ghar matar um oficial que suspeita dela. Robb recebe notícias sobre a traição de Theon e envia homens para retomar Winterfell. Em Qarth, Daenerys trabalha para conseguir um navio para transportar um exército para Westeros enquanto mantém Daxos à distância. Uma das empregadas de Daenerys é morta e seus dragões roubados.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Theon assume o controle de Winterfell. Jon captura uma selvagem, chamada Ygritte. O povo de Porto Real começa a se voltar contra o Rei Joffrey. Daenerys procura comprar navios para navegar pelos Sete Reinos.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S02E6 - The Old Gods and the New
objects.__Episode__title_short: Os Deuses Antigos e os Novos

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: Against Cersei's wishes, Tyrion sends her and Jaime's daughter, Myrcella, to Dorne for protection. Theon captures Winterfell and executes Ser Rodrik Cassel. Osha, the captive Wildling, along with Hodor, helps Bran and Rickon escape. Robb reunites with the healer, Talisa Maegyr. At the Fist of the First Men, Jon captures a Wildling named Ygritte, but is separated from his patrol while pursuing her after she escapes. Joffrey incites a riot at King's Landing, in which he is nearly killed and Sansa almost raped. Tywin allows Littlefinger to seek the Tyrells' allegiance. At Harrenhal, Arya has H'ghar kill an officer who is suspicious of her. Robb receives news about Theon's treachery and sends men to retake Winterfell. At Qarth, Daenerys works to procure a ship to transport an army to Westeros while keeping Daxos at bay. One of Daenerys' maids is killed and her dragons stolen.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Theon seizes control of Winterfell. Jon captures a wildling, named Ygritte. The people of King's Landing begin to turn against King Joffrey. Daenerys looks to buy ships to sail for the Seven Kingdoms.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S02E6 - The Old Gods and the New
objects.__Episode__title_short: The Old Gods and the New

objects.__Episode__title: HotD S01E1 - The Heirs of the Dragon

Viserys hosts a tournament to celebrate the birth of his second child. Rhaenyra
welcomes her uncle Daemon back to the Red Keep.

Viserys hosts a tournament to celebrate the birth of his second child. Rhaenyra

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: Tommen é coroado rei; Cersei surpreende Margaery encorajando-a a se casar com Tommen. Tywin pede a Oberyn que seja juiz no julgamento de Tyrion e jura sua inocência no estupro e assassinato de Elia. No Vale, Mindinho leva Sansa para o Ninho da Águia, onde ela se reencontra com sua tia, Lysa Arryn, que pressiona Mindinho a se casar com ela imediatamente. É revelado que Lysa e Mindinho mataram Jon Arryn e incriminaram os Lannisters. Lysa planeja que Sansa se case com seu filho, Robin, um menino pré-adolescente emocionalmente imaturo. The Hound zomba de Arya praticando sua dança na água e menospreza o estilo de luta de Syrios Forell. Brienne descobre que Podrick não possui habilidades práticas de escudeiro, mas fica impressionada por ele ter matado uma Guarda Real para proteger Tyrion. Além da Muralha, o grupo de Jon encontra e derrota os amotinados. Sem que Jon saiba, Bran e seus companheiros estão presos lá. Locke tenta sequestrar Bran na confusão, mas Hodor, pressionado por Bran, o mata e liberta os outros. Jojen convence Bran de que eles devem continuar para o norte, enquanto os homens de Jon estão queimando a Fortaleza de Craster e libertando sua filha/esposas. Em Meereen, depois que Jorah informa a Daenerys que Astapor e Yunkai voltaram à escravidão, ela adia a invasão de Westeros para governar como rainha até que a Baía dos Escravos seja verdadeiramente livre.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Tommen é coroado Rei dos Sete Reinos. Cersei constrói seu caso contra Tyrion. Sansa e Lord Baelish chegam ao Ninho da Águia. A Patrulha da Noite ataca a Fortaleza de Craster.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S04E5 - First of His Name

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: Tommen is crowned king; Cersei surprises Margaery by encouraging her to marry Tommen. Tywin asks Oberyn to be a judge at Tyrion's trial and swears his innocence in Elia's rape and murder. In the Vale, Littlefinger takes Sansa to the Eyrie where she is reunited with her aunt, Lysa Arryn, who pressures Littlefinger to marry her immediately. It is revealed that Lysa and Littlefinger killed Jon Arryn and framed the Lannisters. Lysa plans for Sansa to marry her son, Robin, an emotionally immature prepubescent boy. The Hound mocks Arya practicing her water dancing and disparages Syrios Forell's fighting style. Brienne learns that Podrick lacks practical squiring skills but is impressed he killed a Kingsguard to protect Tyrion. Beyond the Wall, Jon's group find and defeat the mutineers. Unknown to Jon, Bran and his companions are captives there. Locke attempts to kidnap Bran in the confusion, but Hodor, warged into by Bran, kills him and frees the others. Jojen convinces Bran that they must continue north, while Jon's men are burning Craster's Keep and free his daughter/wives. In Meereen, after Jorah informs Daenerys that Astapor and Yunkai have reverted to slavery, she postpones invading Westeros to instead rule as queen until Slaver's Bay is truly free.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Tommen is crowned King of the Seven Kingdoms. Cersei builds her case against Tyrion. Sansa and Lord Baelish arrive at the Eyrie. The Night's Watch attacks Craster's Keep.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S04E5 - First of His Name

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__title: GOT S05E9 - The Dance of Dragons

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: Ramsay leads a covert attack on Stannis' camp, destroying siege equipment, food stores, and killing many horses. After dispatching Davos to Castle Black to request more supplies, Stannis, with Selyse's approval, allows Melisandre to sacrifice Shireen, burning her alive at the stake, believing it will help win the war. Jon and the other survivors return to the Wall, allowing the Wildlings to pass South. In Dorne, Prince Doran has permitted Jaime and Bronn to return to King's Landing with Myrcella, provided Trystane accompanies them and serves on the small council in Oberyn's stead. Doran also pardons Ellaria and her daughters. Arya aborts her first assassination assignment after spotting Trant accompanying Mace Tyrell, the Master of Coin, who has arrived in Braavos to negotiate with the Iron Bank. In Meereen, combat at Daznak's fighting pit resume. Daenerys is stunned that Jorah is among the fighters. His victory is interrupted when the Sons of the Harpy launch a surprise attack. Loraq is killed while Jorah saves Daenerys. The Harpies quickly swarm Daenerys and her supporters, forcing them and Jorah to retreat into the pit. Drogon suddenly arrives, burning many Sons of the Harpy; Daenerys mounts Drogon and commands him to fly away.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Jon and the wildlings return to Castle Black. Jaime meets with Doran Martell. Stannis makes a hard choice. Arya runs into Meryn Trant. Daenerys attends the grand reopening of the fighting pits.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S05E9 - The Dance of Dragons

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: Rhaenyra oversteps at the Small Council. Viserys is urged to secure the succession through marriage. Daemon announces his intentions.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Rhaenyra oversteps at the Small Council. Viserys is urged to secure the succession through marriage. Daemon announces his intentions.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Rhaenyra oversteps at the Small Council. Viserys is urged to secure the succession through marriage. Daemon announces his intentions.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: A frota de Stannis ataca Porto Real. Sansa joga o jogo, tentando manipular Joffrey para liderar o ataque pessoalmente (na esperança de matá-lo), mas Joffrey fica com muito medo de lutar pessoalmente. Liderando a defesa, Tyrion destrói muitos navios atacantes com fogo, forçando Stannis a atacar em terra. Sandor Clegane lidera a defesa do lado de fora do portão, mas é derrotado e recua para dentro, denunciando Joffrey e saindo. Joffrey recua com medo enquanto Tyrion reúne os Mantos Dourados para lutar com ele. As forças de Stannis entram no castelo, mas Tyrion lidera seus homens atrás das forças de Stannis através de túneis e monta um ataque de retaguarda. Cersei vai para a sala do trono com Tommen, com a intenção de matá-lo para salvá-lo de ser capturado. Shae convence Sansa a se esconder em seu quarto. Sandor Clegane se oferece para levar Sansa para Winterfell, mas ela se recusa a sair. Enquanto Tyrion está ferido e Cersei está prestes a envenenar Tommen, as forças de Tywin, unidas por Loras, chegam e forçam Stannis a recuar.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: A frota e o exército de Stannis Baratheon chegam a Porto Real e a batalha pela cidade começa. Cersei planeja para ela e para o futuro de seus filhos.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: Stannis' fleet assaults King's Landing. Sansa plays the game, trying to manipulate Joffrey into leading the attack personally, (in hopes of getting him killed), but Joffrey turns out to be too afraid to fight personally. Leading the defense, Tyrion destroys many attacking ships with wildfire, forcing Stannis to attack on land. Sandor Clegane leads the defense outside the gate, but is defeated and retreats inside, denouncing Joffrey and leaving. Joffrey retreats in fear as Tyrion rallies the Gold Cloaks into fighting with him. Stannis' forces enter the castle, but Tyrion leads his men behind Stannis' forces via tunnels and mounts a rearguard attack. Cersei goes to the throne room with Tommen, intending to kill him to save him from being captured. Shae convinces Sansa to hide in her chamber. Sandor Clegane offers to take Sansa to Winterfell, but she refuses to leave. As Tyrion lies wounded and Cersei is about to poison Tommen, Tywin's forces, joined by Loras, arrive and force Stannis to retreat.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Stannis Baratheon's fleet and army arrive at King's Landing and the battle for the city begins. Cersei plans for her and her children's future.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: O encontro de Jon com Mance Rayder termina abruptamente quando Stannis e seu exército invadem o acampamento dos Selvagens, fazendo Mance prisioneiro. Bran encontra o represeiro de suas visões, mas criaturas esqueléticas atacam o grupo, matando Jojen. Um Filho da Floresta salva os outros e os leva para o Corvo de Três Olhos, revelado ser um velho envolto em raízes de árvores dentro de uma caverna segura. No Vale, Brienne e Podrick encontram Arya e o Cão, que ataca Brienne; ela o fere criticamente, enquanto Arya foge e foge de Brienne. O Cão implora a Arya para matá-lo, mas ela pega seu dinheiro e o deixa para morrer. Ela embarca em um navio com destino a Bravos para encontrar H'ghar. Em Porto Real, Cersei ordena que Qyburn salve Sor Gregor, que foi envenenado pela lâmina de Oberyn. Jaime liberta Tyrion da prisão, mas antes de escapar da cidade, Tyrion encontra Shae na cama de Tywin e a estrangula fatalmente. Ele confronta e mata Tywin no banheiro, então é contrabandeado a bordo de um navio por Varys. Em Meereen, alguns ex-escravos sentem falta de seus vínculos, achando a liberdade uma dificuldade. Um cidadão traz a Daenerys os restos carbonizados de sua filha, queimados pelo fogo do dragão. Daenerys acorrenta Rhaegal e Viserion nas catacumbas, enquanto Drogon permanece foragido.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Jon toma uma decisão importante. Daenerys experimenta novas consequências. Brienne e Podrick têm um encontro inesperado. Bran atinge um objetivo, enquanto Tyrion faz uma importante descoberta.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: Jon's meeting with Mance Rayder abruptly ends when Stannis and his army overrun the Wildling camp, taking Mance prisoner. Bran finds the weirwood tree from his visions but skeletal creatures attack the group, killing Jojen. A Child of the Forest saves the others and takes them to the Three-Eyed Raven, revealed to be an old man encased within tree roots inside a secure cave. In the Vale, Brienne and Podrick encounter Arya and the Hound, who attacks Brienne; she critically wounds him, while Arya runs off and evades Brienne. The Hound begs Arya to kill him, but she takes his money and leaves him for dead. She boards a ship headed to Braavos to find H'ghar. In King's Landing, Cersei orders Qyburn to save Ser Gregor, who was poisoned by Oberyn's blade. Jaime releases Tyrion from prison, but before escaping the city, Tyrion finds Shae in Tywin's bed and fatally strangles her. He confronts and kills Tywin in the privy, then is smuggled aboard a ship by Varys. In Meereen, some ex-slaves miss their bonds, finding freedom a hardship. A citizen brings Daenerys his daughter's charred remains, burned by dragon fire. Daenerys chains Rhaegal and Viserion in the catacombs, while Drogon remains at large.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Jon makes an important decision. Daenerys experiences new consequences. Brienne and Podrick have an unexpected encounter. Bran achieves a goal, while Tyrion makes an important discovery.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: Porto Real hospeda o casamento de Tyrion e Sansa. Cersei mostra seu descontentamento com Margaery e Loras. Na festa de casamento, Tyrion causa uma cena de embriaguez. Tywin exige que Tyrion produza rapidamente um herdeiro Lannister, mas Tyrion mais tarde garante a Sansa que seu casamento nunca será consumado sem o consentimento dela. Sandor diz a Arya que eles estão indo para as Gêmeas para resgatá-la para Robb. Stannis libera Davos, exigindo que ele respeite Melisandre. Ela chega em Pedra do Dragão com Gendry, a quem ela seduz para extrair seu sangue usando sanguessugas. Em um ritual mágico, Stannis lança as sanguessugas cheias de sangue no fogo enquanto nomeia três usurpadores: Robb Stark, Balon Greyjoy e Rei Joffrey. Daenerys descobre que Yunkai empregou mercenários chamados de "Segundos Filhos". Um de seus belos tenentes, Daario Naharis, mata os outros líderes e promete a lealdade da empresa a Daenerys. Sam e Gilly são atacados por um White Walker, que Sam destrói com uma adaga de vidro de dragão.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Daenerys tenta persuadir os Segundos Filhos a se juntarem a ela contra Yunkai. Stannis libera Davos das masmorras. Sam e Gilly são atacados por um White Walker. Sansa e Tyrion se casam.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: King's Landing hosts Tyrion and Sansa's wedding. Cersei shows her displeasure toward Margaery and Loras. At the wedding feast, Tyrion cause a drunken scene. Tywin demands that Tyrion quickly produce a Lannister heir, but Tyrion later assures Sansa their marriage will never be consummated without her consent. Sandor tells Arya they are heading for the Twins to ransom her to Robb. Stannis releases Davos, demanding he respect Melisandre. She arrives in Dragonstone with Gendry, whom she seduces to extract his blood using leeches. In a magical ritual, Stannis casts the blood-filled leeches into a fire while naming three usurpers: Robb Stark, Balon Greyjoy, and King Joffrey. Daenerys learns that Yunkai has employed mercenaries called the "Second Sons". One of their handsome lieutenants, Daario Naharis, kills the other leaders and pledges the company's loyalty to Daenerys. Sam and Gilly are attacked by a White Walker, which Sam destroys with a dragonglass dagger.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Daenerys tries to persuade the Second Sons to join her against Yunkai. Stannis releases Davos from the dungeons. Sam and Gilly are attacked by a White Walker. Sansa and Tyrion wed.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Kim e Jimmy alistam um contato experiente; Howard examina as práticas de negócios de Jimmy.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Kim and Jimmy enlist a knowledgeable contact; Howard scrutinizes Jimmy's business practices.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types
Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: Margaery, newly wed to King Tommen Baratheon, manipulates him to consider sending Cersei to Casterly Rock to eliminate her interference. Littlefinger takes Sansa to Winterfell to cement an alliance with Roose Bolton through marriage to his son, Ramsay and Sansa without the Lannisters knowledge. Sansa's unconsummated marriage with Tyrion is considered void. Brienne trains Podrick in swordsmanship. To conform to the House of Black and White, Arya tosses her personal effects into the harbor, but hides Needle in a pile of rocks. At Castle Black, Jon names Thorne First Ranger. When Slynt disobeys Jon's orders, Jon executes him. Lancel discovers the High Septon in a brothel, and he is forced to walk the streets nude as punishment. The High Septon protests to Cersei, who imprisons him. She meets with the High Sparrow, approving the Sparrows' actions. Tyrion and Varys arrive in Volantis. Soon after, Tyrion is abducted by Jorah, intending to give him, "to the queen".
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Tommen and Margaery wed. Arya has trouble adapting to her new life. Littlefinger reveals his plans to Sansa. Jon gives his first orders as Lord Commander. Tyrion and Varys arrive in Volantis.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: Ao retornar a Porto Real, Tyrion para em Winterfell, onde apresenta aos Stark um design de sela que permitirá ao paraplégico Bran andar a cavalo. Ned investiga secretamente a morte de Jon Arryn. No processo, ele descobre um dos filhos ilegítimos do rei Robert, Gendry, um armeiro. Robert e seus convidados participam de um torneio em homenagem a Ned, que Ned considera uma extravagância. Jon toma medidas para proteger Samwell Tarly, um recruta da Patrulha da Noite desajeitado e sem amigos, do abuso dos outros Watchmen. Um Viserys frustrado entra em conflito com sua irmã recém-empoderada. Sansa sonha em um dia se tornar rainha, enquanto Arya imagina um futuro muito diferente. Em uma taverna à beira da estrada, Catelyn, que é filha de Lorde Hoster Tully, inesperadamente encontra Tyrion Lannister. Ela reúne os aliados de seu pai em Correrrio para prender Tyrion por conspirar para assassinar seu filho.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Eddard investiga o assassinato de Jon Arryn. Jon faz amizade com Samwell Tarly, um covarde que veio para se juntar à Patrulha da Noite.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S01E4 - Cripples, Bastards, and Broken Things

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: While returning to King's Landing, Tyrion stops at Winterfell where he presents the Starks a saddle design that will allow the paraplegic Bran to ride a horse. Ned secretly investigates Jon Arryn's death. In the process, he discovers one of King Robert's illegitimate children, Gendry, an armorer. Robert and his guests attend a tournament honoring Ned, which Ned considers an extravagance. Jon takes measures to protect Samwell Tarly, an awkward and friendless Night's Watch recruit, from the other Watchmen's abuse. A frustrated Viserys clashes with his newly-empowered sister. Sansa dreams of one day becoming queen, while Arya envisions a far different future. At a roadside tavern, Catelyn, who is Lord Hoster Tully's daughter, unexpectedly encounters Tyrion Lannister. She rallies her father's Riverrun allies to arrest Tyrion for conspiring to murder her son.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Eddard investigates Jon Arryn's murder. Jon befriends Samwell Tarly, a coward who has come to join the Night's Watch.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S01E4 - Cripples, Bastards, and Broken Things

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis_long: Cersei nomeia Sor Gregor Clegane como seu campeão no próximo julgamento por combate de Tyrion. Jaime e Bronn se recusam a lutar contra Sor Gregor por Tyrion, mas Oberyn aceita. Ele procura vingar sua irmã, o estupro e assassinato de Elia por Sor Gregor durante a rebelião. Daenerys toma Daario como seu amante e o envia para lidar com os traficantes de escravos ressurgentes em Yunkai. Melisandre e Selyse se preparam para partir de Pedra do Dragão, com a intenção de levar Shireen com elas. À medida que os Selvagens se aproximam de Castelo Negro, Alliser Thorne rejeita a sugestão de Jon de selar o túnel. Em uma pousada, Brienne e Podrick conhecem Torta Quente, que os atualiza sobre Arya. Eles resolvem viajar para o Vale, deduzindo que ela procuraria seus parentes vivos lá. No Vale, Lysa testemunha Mindinho beijando Sansa. Enfurecida, ela mais tarde ameaça jogar Sansa pela Moon Door, uma abertura circular no chão de pedra com uma queda íngreme nas rochas abaixo; Mindinho intervém e empurra Lysa para a morte.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_medium: Tyrion tenta encontrar um campeão. Daenerys dorme com Daario. O Cão fica ferido. O conselho de Jon é ignorado em Castelo Negro. Brienne e Podrick recebem uma dica sobre o paradeiro de Arya.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types
